<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Disperse into Air](/Spells.aspx?ID=416)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 391 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Air](/Domains.aspx?ID=2)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You take damage from an enemy or a hazard.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

After taking the triggering damage, you transform into air. Until the end of the current turn, you can't be attacked or targeted, you don't take up space, you can't act, and any auras or emanations you have are suppressed. At the end of the turn, you re-form in any space you can occupy within 15 feet of where you were when you dispersed. Any auras or emanations you had are restored as long as their duration didn't run out while you were dispersed.
name: Disperse into Air
